Title: The Criminal Law of the People's Republic of China explained in pictures
Designer: Qingdao Municipal Exhibition Work Office (青岛市展览工作室)Qingdao Municipal Cultural Center (青岛市文化馆)
Notes: "The Criminal Law of the People's Republic of China explained in pictures", a four-poster set published in October 1979 by the Qingdao Municipal Exhibition Work Office and the Qingdao Municipal Cultural Center, provides a partial explanation of the Criminal Law, starting with Article 90 (Counter-revolutionary crimes). Chapters Two, Three, and Four deal with crimes against the socialist system, the collective economy, and ordinary citizens and their rights.
